original: ** ZE_DARK_SOULS **
zh_trans: ** ZE_DARK_SOULS - 黑暗之魂 **

original: ** Map by HaRyDe. Microsoft. Kotya **
zh_trans: ** 地图作者: HaRyDe. Microsoft. Kotya **

original: ** Special thanks to Brunelazo343 for custom skins **
zh_trans: ** 特别感谢 Brunelazo343 提供的定制皮肤 **

original: ** The Catacombs gates will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 地下墓穴的大门将在 20 秒后开启 **

original: ** This catacombs located under the city of the gods **
zh_trans: ** 这个地下墓穴位于众神之城的下方 **

original: ** They have long time been abandoned and forgotten by both the undead and the gods themselves **
zh_trans: ** 它们早已被不死者和众神自己所遗弃和遗忘 **

original: ** The exit from the catacombs will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 从地下墓穴出去的门将在 20 秒后开启 **

original: ** Rumors has it that crystal lizards are born in this cave **
zh_trans: ** 有传言结晶蜥蜴出生于这个洞穴 **

original: ** Other rumors say that a forbidden cult has settled here **
zh_trans: ** 另有传言说一个被禁止的邪教团体在此定居 **

original: ** Teleport will be activated in 50 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 传送将在 50 秒后激活 **

original: ** Magic Ember **
zh_trans: ** 魔法余烬 **

original: ** Eye collected 0/7**
zh_trans: ** 眼球收集进度： 0/7 **

original: ** Champion mode **
zh_trans: ** 冠军模式 **

original: ** The Lower Asylum gates will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 下层收容所的大门将在 15 秒后打开 **

original: ** Everything secret has now become visible **
zh_trans: ** 一切隐秘之事如今都已显明 **

original: ** 1/6 crystal lizards were collected **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 1/6 的结晶蜥蜴 **

original: ** 2/6 crystal lizards were collected **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 2/6 的结晶蜥蜴 **

original: ** The Asylum Main gates will open will open in 25 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 收容所的正门将在 25 秒后打开 **

original: ** The Stray Demon was defeated **
zh_trans: ** 离群恶魔被击败了 **

original: ** The Stray Demon is a greater demon spawned from the Bed of Chaos **
zh_trans: ** 离群恶魔是从混沌温床中诞生的大型恶魔 **

original: ** The Stray Demon was keeping an eye for no one undead leaves the prison.. **
zh_trans: ** 离群恶魔一直在注视着，不让任何不死者离开监狱 **

original: ** The Top Asylum gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 上层收容所的大门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The Northern Undead Asylum lays in the far North **
zh_trans: ** 北方不死院位于遥远的北方 **

original: ** It serves as a giant prison for the Undead branded with the Darksign. Allowing them to be reborn after death **
zh_trans: ** 它是一个巨大的监狱，用来关押被烙上黑暗印记的不死者，让他们死后能够重生 **

original: ** 3/6 crystal lizards were collected **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 3/6 的结晶蜥蜴 **

original: ** The elevator is on the way. Defend for some time **
zh_trans: ** 电梯正在路上。防守一段时间。**

original: ** All Undead are corralled and led to the Asylum. meant to reside here till the end of the world **
zh_trans: ** 所有的不死者都被聚集起来并被带到收容所，意味着要在此居住直到世界末日 **

original: ** Get in the elevator **
zh_trans: ** 进电梯 **

original: ** The paths of this location often run along the edge of deep crevices. ready at any moment to hide the corpse of an unwary traveler in its womb **
zh_trans: ** 这地方的路常常沿着深裂缝的边缘延伸。随时准备将粗心旅行者的尸体藏在它的深处 **

original: ** So be careful and watch your step **
zh_trans: ** 所以要小心注意脚下 **

original: ** 4/6 crystal lizards were collected **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 4/6 的结晶蜥蜴 **

original: ** The crimson eye has been picked up **
zh_trans: ** 已拾起深红眼眸 **

original: ** The Old Church gates will open in 25 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 旧教堂的大门将在 25 秒后开启 **

original: ** Not far from the old church. according to legends. there is the grave of a legendary hero. from where the howl of a lone wolf can sometimes be heard **
zh_trans: ** 离那座旧教堂不远的地方，据传说所述，有一座传奇英雄的坟墓。在那里，有时能听到孤独的狼嚎声 **

original: ** Looks like the main path is destroyed. We need to find another path to Old Church **
zh_trans: ** 看起来主路被毁了。我们需要另寻一条通往旧教堂的路 **

original: ** 5/6 crystal lizards were collected **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 5/6 的结晶蜥蜴 **

original: ** The Uppear gates of Old Church will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 旧教堂的上层大门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The Gate of the Lower Tombs will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 下层墓穴之门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** A once forgotten Tomb of Giants. Here lie those who fought against the dragons. under the command of Gwyn himself **
zh_trans: ** 一座曾经被遗忘的巨人墓地。那些在葛温亲自指挥下与巨龙作战之人就安息于此 **

original: ** The Main Gate will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 正门将在 20 秒后开启 **

original: ** The deepest gate will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 最深处的门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The local clerics say what these places hold their own dark secrets **
zh_trans: ** 当地的神职人员说这些地方都有它们自己的黑暗秘密 **

original: ** Items damage has been increased **
zh_trans: ** 神器的伤害已提高 **

original: ** The gate will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 大门将在 15 秒后开启 **

original: ** The elevator door will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 电梯门将在 10 秒后打开 **

original: ** The elevator will start moving in 20 seconds. Be inside before elevator starts moving **
zh_trans: ** 电梯将在 20 秒后开始移动。在电梯开始移动之前进入电梯。**

original: ** Find the lever to open the bottom gate in the Depths **
zh_trans: ** 在深渊中找到操纵杆以打开底部的门 **

original: ** Great job. The Gates of the Depths will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 干得漂亮。深渊之门将在 15 秒后开启 **

original: ** Blighttown is the place where all the damned and sick undead came from Lordran **
zh_trans: ** 病村是罗德兰所有被诅咒和患病的不死者的来源地 **

original: ** But as soon as the Lost Izalith fell from the onslaught of demons. this place became unsuitable for life even for the dead **
zh_trans: ** 但失落的伊扎里斯被恶魔猛攻而沦陷，这个地方就变得不适合死者生存了 **

original: ** The entrance to the strange lair will open in 30 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 通往奇异巢穴的入口将在 30 秒后开启 **

original: ** Chaos Witch Quelaag is dead... **
zh_trans: ** 混沌魔女克拉格已死... **

original: ** Quelaag is one of the daughters of the witch of Izalith. She and her sister fled from Izalith when the city was covered by the Flames of Chaos **
zh_trans: ** 克拉格是伊扎里斯魔女的女儿之一。当伊扎里斯城被混沌火焰覆盖时，她和她的妹妹逃离了那里 **

original: ** Unfortunately. they were affected by mutations. but not completely... **
zh_trans: ** 不幸的是，她们受到了变异的影响，但并未完全变异... **

original: ** The Sanctuary Gates will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 圣殿大门将在 15 秒后开启 **

original: ** Quelaag settled in the lower part of the Blighttown. where the undead. infected by the Black Plague. began to serve her and her sister **
zh_trans: ** 克拉格在病村下层定居下来。在那里，被黑死病感染的不死者开始为她和她的妹妹效力 **

original: ** This is not an ordinary elevator. It will start moving in 30 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 这不是一部普通的电梯。它将在 30 秒后开始运行。**

original: ** Looks like someone deliberately sent the undead from the top right here to appease one of the witchs of Izalith daughters **
zh_trans: ** 看起来像是有人故意把不死者从上层送到这里来安抚伊扎里斯魔女的女儿 **

original: ** The old doors will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 旧门将在 20 秒后打开 **

original: ** The lost undead came here in search of salvation. but many of them met here something different than salvation... **
zh_trans: ** 迷失的不死者来到此处寻求救赎，但他们中的许多人在此遇到的并非救赎... **

original: ** The gate will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 大门将在 20 秒后开启 **

original: ** The old gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 古老的大门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** Looks like we finally found a workaround to our main route **
zh_trans: ** 看起来我们终于为我们的主要行进路线找到了一条迂回的路 **

original: ** The exit from the Old Church will open in 25 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 从旧教堂出去的门将在 25 秒后开启 **

original: ** This statue... it is beautiful and it radiates an unusual warmth around it **
zh_trans: ** 这座雕像...它很美，周围散发着一种不同寻常的温暖 **

original: ** The Sen's Fortress gates will open in 30 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 塞恩古城的大门将在 30 秒后开启 **

original: ** This is a special fort. an ancient refuge. erected by the gods in order to protect the passage to Anor Londo and test intruders **
zh_trans: ** 这是一座特殊的堡垒，一个古老的避难所，由众神建造，目的是保护通往亚诺尔隆德的通道并考验闯入者 **

original: ** The main hall gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 主厅的大门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** Well done. The Main gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 干得好。主门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The External gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 外门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** WATCH OUT FOR BOULDERS! **
zh_trans: ** 小心滚石！**

original: ** The gate of torture room will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 刑讯室的门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The control of boulders room are open **
zh_trans: ** 滚石控制房已开放 **

original: ** ALL THE BOULDERS ARE DISABLED! ***
zh_trans: ** 所有滚石已停止！**

original: ** Well done**Wait 5 more seconds till the gate opens **
zh_trans: ** 做得好！等待 5 秒，直到大门打开 **

original: ** Well done. Wait 15 more seconds till the gate opens **
zh_trans: ** 干得不错。再等 15 秒，直到大门开启 **

original: ** The path to the Upper part of the Fortress will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 通往要塞上层的道路将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** All we need to do now is find the way to the very top of the fortress **
zh_trans: ** 现在要做的是找到通往要塞最顶层的路 **

original: ** The Main Gates will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 主大门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The bridge gates will open in 5 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 桥门将在 5 秒后开启 **

original: ** The internal gate will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 内门将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** The Tower gates will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 塔楼的门将在 15 秒后开启 **

original: ** Looks like the main gate is closed. We need to find a lever to open it **
zh_trans: ** 看起来主门关闭着。我们需要找到一个操纵杆来打开它 **

original: ** The Arena Gates will open in 15 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 竞技场大门将在 15 秒后开启 **

original: ** The Iron Golem is defeated **
zh_trans: ** 钢铁傀儡被打败了 **

original: ** The Iron Golem was created by the gods to protect Anor Londo from the undead and other demons appeared with a mysterious mist.. **
zh_trans: ** 钢铁傀儡由众神创造，用于保护亚诺尔隆德免受不死者以及随着神秘迷雾出现的其他恶魔的侵害 **

original: ** ..He killed many heroes on the way to the City of the Gods **
zh_trans: *** ..在通往众神之城的道路上，他杀死了许多英雄 **

original: ** Eye collected 1/7**
zh_trans: ** 眼球收集进度： 1/7 **

original: ** Admin Set Champion mode **
zh_trans: ** 管理员已设置为 冠军模式 **

original: ** Zombies got there before humans! You lost! **
zh_trans: ** 僵尸触发了机关! 回合失败!

original: ** Fire keeper soul has been picked up 1/5 **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 1/5 的防火女魂魄 **

original: ** The Old Church gates will open in 35 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 旧教堂之门将在 35 秒后开启 **

original: ** Fire keeper soul has been picked up 2/5 **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 2/5 的防火女魂魄 **

original: ** Well done. Wait 5 more seconds till the gate opens **
zh_trans: ** 干得不错. 等待 5 秒后大门开启 **

original: ** Fire keeper soul has been picked up 3/5 **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 3/5 的防火女魂魄 **

original: ** The exit from the catacombs will open in 10 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 地下墓穴的出口将在 10 秒后开启 **

original: ** Fire keeper soul has been picked up 4/5 **
zh_trans: ** 已收集 4/5 的防火女魂魄 **

original: ** Eye collected 3/7**
zh_trans: ** 眼球收集进度： 3/7 **

original: **The gate of a ruined church will open in 30 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 遗忘教堂之门将在 30 秒后开启 **

original: **The fire will fade away in 20 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 火焰将在 20 秒后消逝 **

original: **The fire will fade away in 10 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 火焰将在 10 秒后消逝 **

original: **The passage to the First Flame will open in 25 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 前往初始之火的通道将在 25 秒后开启 **

original: **Gwyn Lord of Cinder is dead...**
zh_trans: **乌薪王葛温 陨落...

original: **After the fall of the Oolacile. Betrayal of his advisers and the disappearance of four kings...**
zh_trans: ** 乌拉席露沦陷后... 先知的背叛与四王子的失踪... **

original: **...Gwyn realized that the abyss is right around him. Then he gathered his last strength...**
zh_trans: **...葛温意识到他彻底笼罩在深渊之中. 于是他凝聚起最后的力量...

original: **...He ordered his Black Knightes to seal the passage to the First Flame...**
zh_trans: **...他向黑骑士下令，命其封锁初始之火的道路...

original: **...Gwyn knew that only the Dark Lord will be able to reach him... and the First flame...**
zh_trans: **...葛温知道，只有黑暗之王才能触及他...和初始之火...**

original: **... Choose your destiny ...**
zh_trans: **... 请选择您的命运... 传火，亦或是...离开...?

original: ** 5 Second teleport **
zh_trans: *** 5 秒后传送 **

original: ** All items charges are restored **
zh_trans: ** 所有神器已重置 **

original: ** Survive 40 seconds **
** Survive 10 seconds **
** To Link the Fire ending was completed **
zh_trans: ** 已达成结局 传火 **

original: ** A new zombie teleport is available **
zh_trans: ** 新的僵尸传送点现已激活 **

original: ** The deepest gate will open in 20 seconds **
zh_trans: ** 最深处的大门将在 20 秒后开启 **

original: ** Base health has been increased **
zh_trans: ** 基础生命值已增加 **

zh_trans: ** 眼球收集进度： 4/7 **

original: 由于当前地图难度，将初始血量改为200，同时购买时间改为无限
** Run Away **
zh_trans: ** 快走吧 **

zh_trans: ** 最后一扇大门 120 秒后关闭 **

zh_trans: ** 最后一扇大门 40 秒后关闭 **

zh_trans: ** 最后一扇大门 20 秒后关闭 **

zh_trans: ** 最后一扇大门 10 秒后关闭 **

zh_trans: ** 已达成结局 黑暗之王 **
